resources.string: I understand account deletion is permanent and cannot be reversed.
"Account deletion is permanent and cannot be reversed. "

"This request is separate from any other data privacy rights you may have given your residency. To see a full profile of your data control rights and additional actions you can take, please refer to our "

"If you delete your account, you'll lose access to it, in addition to any information associated with it - including watchlists, watch history, playhead positions, and other user generated content.
"
"Account deletion is a privacy feature that gives you more control over your data. If you delete your account, you'll still be a subscribed Crunchyroll user. "
Canceling your subscription is an additional step

".
If you want to unsubscribe from Crunchyroll and you signed up through the app, you can cancel your subscription through your Android device. If you subscribed a different way, please "
I understand by cancelling my subscription, I will lose access to ad-free viewing and other Premium perks.
You must cancel your subscription before deleting your account. If you have done so already, are you sure you want to delete your account?
You must cancel your subscription in order to delete your account.
You will be asked to verify your email in the next step.

%1$s If you delete your account, you will permanently lose access to it, in addition to any information associated with it - including watchlists, watch history, playhead positions, and other content specific to your account.
What is the main reason you’re deleting your account? (Optional)
Account deletion is permanent and cannot be reversed.
I’m no longer interested in anime
There is a lack of dubbed content

We’d hate to see you leave behind all the benefits of being part of Crunchyroll Premium. Here are just some of the features you’ll lose access to when you cancel:

Your membership, starting with a free trial period if eligible, will begin when you click %1$s. If eligible for a free trial, you will be charged %2$s plus any applicable taxes when your free trial ends; otherwise, you will be charged immediately when you begin your membership. Your membership will renew automatically unless you choose to cancel your membership through Google Play at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. By purchasing a membership you are agreeing to our %3$s and %4$s.

Your membership, starting with an introductory price period if eligible, will begin when you click %1$s. Your membership will renew automatically unless you choose to cancel your membership through Google Play at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. By purchasing a membership you are agreeing to our %3$s and %4$s.

This option stops the sharing of personal information with third parties for only this app on this device. This prevents personalized video ads and substitutes more generic video ads that are not determined based on your personal information. Note that enabling this feature will not change the presentation of ads nor the duration of ad breaks for non-Premium members. To learn more about how your data is shared and for more options, including ways to opt-out across other Sony Pictures Entertainment properties, please visit %1$s.
For California residents only pursuant to the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
